items.name: upload
items.title: Astrify Upload Module
items.description: A complete file upload module for Laravel, React, and Inertia.js
items.docs:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 Remaining Installation Steps:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. Configure Routes

Add a route for the SignedUrlController to your routes file:

Route::post('/upload/signed-url',
    \App\Http\Controllers\Astrify\SignedUrlController::class
)->name('upload.signed-url')->middleware(['auth']);

2. Install Laravel Dependencies

Install the Flysystem S3 package via the Composer package manager:

composer require league/flysystem-aws-s3-v3:^3.0

3. Configure your S3 Storage

For local development we recommend using MinIO as a self-hosted S3-compatible storage solution. Set the required AWS environment variables in your .env file.
